MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Loaders.​UnityAssetsScriptLoader
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Loaders.​ScriptLoaderBase
public
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​Loaders.​UnityAssetsScriptLoader

A script loader which can load scripts from assets in Unity3D.  Scripts should be saved as .txt files in a subdirectory of Assets/Resources.  When MoonSharp is activated on Unity3D and the default script loader is used, scripts should be saved as .txt files in Assets/Resources/MoonSharp/Scripts.

Variables
m_Resources
Dictionary<string, string> m_Resources
Constants
DEFAULT_PATH
public const string DEFAULT_PATH

The default path where scripts are meant to be stored (if not changed)

Functions
UnityAssetsScriptLoader
public UnityAssetsScriptLoader(
string assetsPath =  null
)

Initializes a new instance of the UnityAssetsScriptLoader class.

Parameter
assetsPath
string

The path, relative to Assets/Resources. For example if your scripts are stored under Assets/Resources/Scripts, you should pass the value "Scripts". If null, "MoonSharp/Scripts" is used.

LoadFile
public override object LoadFile(
string file,
Table globalContext
)

Opens a file for reading the script code.  It can return either a string, a byte[] or a Stream.  If a byte[] is returned, the content is assumed to be a serialized (dumped) bytecode. If it's a string, it's assumed to be either a script or the output of a string.dump call. If a Stream, autodetection takes place.

Parameters
file
string

The file.

globalContext
Table

The global context.

Returns

A string, a byte[] or a Stream.

Exceptions
System.Exception

UnityAssetsScriptLoader.LoadFile : Cannot load  + file

)

string

The file.

public string[] GetLoadedScripts()
